member.name: D2D1_ORIENTATION
member.summary: Specifies the flip and rotation at which an image appears.

member.name: D2D1_ORIENTATION.D2D1_ORIENTATION_ROTATE_CLOCKWISE180
member.summary: The image is rotated clockwise 180 degrees.

member.name: D2D1_ORIENTATION.D2D1_ORIENTATION_ROTATE_CLOCKWISE180_FLIP_HORIZONTAL
member.summary: The image is rotated clockwise 180 degrees, then flipped horizontally.

member.name: D2D1_ORIENTATION.D2D1_ORIENTATION_ROTATE_CLOCKWISE90_FLIP_HORIZONTAL
member.summary: The image is rotated clockwise 90 degrees, then flipped horizontally.

member.name: D2D1_ORIENTATION.D2D1_ORIENTATION_ROTATE_CLOCKWISE270
member.summary: The image is rotated clockwise 270 degrees.

member.name: D2D1_ORIENTATION.D2D1_ORIENTATION_ROTATE_CLOCKWISE270_FLIP_HORIZONTAL
member.summary: The image is rotated clockwise 270 degrees, then flipped horizontally.

member.name: D2D1_ORIENTATION.D2D1_ORIENTATION_ROTATE_CLOCKWISE90
member.summary: The image is rotated clockwise 90 degrees.
